title: Manohari Kundanalu: Exquisite Gemstone and Diamond Stud Earrings
features: Floral design with a central Emerald surrounded by Rubies. Intricate gold filigree work interspersed with sparkling cubic zirconia for a radiant glow. The openwork design allows light to beautifully illuminate the gemstones. Secured with a traditional screw-back closure for comfort and security.
occasions: and formal gatherings. Can also be worn as everyday statement pieces to add a touch of tradition to modern outfits.
description: Classic South Indian design reimagined with modern craftsmanship. The vibrant gemstone combination is considered auspicious in Telugu culture. The 22K gold ensures lasting value and a rich, traditional luster. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a smooth, high-shine finish. A versatile piece that can be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary attire.
